location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Commander James Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Political Agent in Turkish Arabia, at Baghdad

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Political Agent that the dispute between Syed Saeed [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd], the Imam of Muscat, and the Persians over Bunder Abbas [Bandar-e ʻAbbās] has been brought to a satisfactory settlement. It includes a short extract of a letter from the British Minister at Tehran to the Acting Resident on the subject, dated 28 November 1855.
